abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Balmiki Prasad
            Singh at the meeting of May 31, 2001 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, Information Infrastructure Sector
            Development Project, and Irrigation Based Community
            Development Program for Morocco.
